meanings.definition: Familiar with and at ease in many different countries and cultures.
meanings.sent1: She is a cosmopolitan traveler who enjoys exploring new cultures.
meanings.sent2: The cosmopolitan city attracts people from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The cosmopolitan chef blended flavors from various countries to create a unique dish.
meanings.sent4: Her cosmopolitan wardrobe reflects her love for diverse fashion trends.
meanings.sent5: The cosmopolitan art exhibition showcased works from international artists.

meanings.definition: A person who is free from local, provincial, or national bias or attachment; citizen of the world.
meanings.sent1: As a cosmopolitan, he felt equally at home in any country he visited.
meanings.sent2: The cosmopolitan believed in the importance of global unity.
meanings.sent3: The little girl declared herself a cosmopolitan princess of the playground.
meanings.sent4: In his heart, he was a true cosmopolitan, belonging to humanity as a whole.
meanings.sent5: The wise old man was a living example of a true cosmopolitan, embracing all cultures.
